doc.after: The climate of the Americas varies significantly from region to region Tropical rainforest climate occurs in the latitudes of the Amazon American cloud forests Florida and Darien Gap In the Rocky Mountains and Andes a similar climate is observed Often the higher altitudes of these mountains are snow capped
